game.name: Broth Bounty
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Broth Bounty is a fast-paced 2D shooter inspired by classic lightgun games. Blast ingredients into a bubbling pot, dodge hazards, and adapt to roguelite challenges as you cook your way to culinary victory!
